ygData.subject: Re: Charging for Services
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I think that there s nothing wrong with thrying to make some money off your talents... I don t put anything in the trade skills so I rely on wizardry for
ygData.messageBody:
> I guess it is just based on your roleplaying style, but
> even if I have no
> money and still have spells to buy, I would not ask for or
> accept any sort
> of payment for using my talents. Does anyone else agree
> with me or do you
> all think that you SHOULD rightfully earn a profit from
> using your skills?

I think that there's nothing wrong with thrying to make some money off
your talents... I don't put anything in the trade skills so I rely on
wizardry for money ... Most of it comes from loot, but I will
occasionally try and make some money by binding people.
I usually only charge 5gp per bind. And I always do it for free if
the person can't pay or just died... I like to help, but I also need
to make some money.

Aznyin
Level 15 Erudite Wizard
Chivalric Order of Norrath
Current Residence: Rivervale [Solusek Ro]
